title: 28 Of My Favorite Spring Recipes!
description: These 28 recipes for spring will get you super excited for the season! Refreshing and bright flavors with a few spring soups, salads, pizza and more. Bountiful dishes that make you excited to cook again and create vibrant plates.  Spring is here and I am all over these delicious meals. Today I have 28 of […] The post 28 Of My Favorite Spring Recipes! appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: These 28 recipes for spring will get you super excited for the season! Refreshing and bright flavors with a few spring soups, salads, pizza and more!
text: These 28 recipes for spring will get you super excited for the season! Refreshing and bright flavors with a few spring soups, salads, pizza and more. Bountiful dishes that make you excited to cook again and create vibrant plates.  Spring is here and I am all over these delicious meals. Today I have 28 of my favorite spring dishes for you and oh man do I love them so much. I am all about these delish spring recipes. The first three months of the year are always rough here when it comes to produce – it feels like so little is fresh. Finally, I’m getting my hands on some good asparagus and that’s just the start. The recipes below highlight some of my favorite ingredients in the spring season and are perfect to make this weekend! Everything is so bright and fresh and full of vibrance and flavor. I love a mix of refreshing dishes and cozy meals in the spring, when it’s warm in the sunshine but cooler at night. 28 Favorite Recipes For Spring This grilled asparagus caesar is one of my favorite recipes ever! And this asparagus pasta salad is divine. So good prepped ahead of time too. Strawberry salad with savory granola? I love it. We adore these spring couscous bowls! A lemon blueberry cheese danish is super easy and impressive. And pistachio crusted salmon with shaved asparagus. The most stunning carrot tart. Pistachio pesto pizza is fantastic. Lemon crumb cake is always a dream. So is pistachio lemon loaf. We adore this crispy orzo with artichokes and lemon! Shaved asparagus salad with soft boiled eggs is fabulous. And deviled egg salad with bacon and tomatoes is too. Super easy asparagus with lemon vinaigrette. And a warm spring chopped quinoa salad! This roasted carrot coconut soup is perfect for the season. Cool nights, warm days! And cream of asparagus soup is the best way to get your greens! This asparagus souffle frittata is so fluffy! And a spring smothered chicken is super cozy and satisfying. Lavender lemon bars are a must. YES! I love this spring nicoise salad with green beans! And goat cheese tartines are amazing. My all time favorite strawberry crunch salad! My green goddess roasted carrot salad is pretty to look at and equally as delish. This artichoke burrata pizza is crazy good. Can’t ever beat ricotta gnocchi. Or skillet toasted ravioli with lemon. You have to try lavender banana bread! Strawberry iced pound cake too. And finally, strawberry pistachio turnovers!
html:
These 28 recipes for spring will get you super excited for the season! Refreshing and bright flavors with a few spring soups, salads, pizza and more. Bountiful dishes that make you excited to cook again and create vibrant plates. 

Spring is here and I am all over these delicious meals.

Today I have 28 of my favorite spring dishes for you and oh man do I love them so much.

I am all about these delish spring recipes. The first three months of the year are always rough here when it comes to produce – it feels like so little is fresh. Finally, I’m getting my hands on some good asparagus and that’s just the start. The recipes below highlight some of my favorite ingredients in the spring season and are perfect to make this weekend!

Everything is so bright and fresh and full of vibrance and flavor. I love a mix of refreshing dishes and cozy meals in the spring, when it’s warm in the sunshine but cooler at night.

28 Favorite Recipes For Spring

This grilled asparagus caesar is one of my favorite recipes ever!

And this asparagus pasta salad is divine. So good prepped ahead of time too.

Strawberry salad with savory granola? I love it.

We adore these spring couscous bowls!

A lemon blueberry cheese danish is super easy and impressive.

And pistachio crusted salmon with shaved asparagus.

The most stunning carrot tart.

Pistachio pesto pizza is fantastic.

Lemon crumb cake is always a dream.

So is pistachio lemon loaf.

We adore this crispy orzo with artichokes and lemon!

Shaved asparagus salad with soft boiled eggs is fabulous.

And deviled egg salad with bacon and tomatoes is too.

Super easy asparagus with lemon vinaigrette.

And a warm spring chopped quinoa salad!

This roasted carrot coconut soup is perfect for the season. Cool nights, warm days!

And cream of asparagus soup is the best way to get your greens!

This asparagus souffle frittata is so fluffy!

And a spring smothered chicken is super cozy and satisfying.

Lavender lemon bars are a must. YES!

I love this spring nicoise salad with green beans!

And goat cheese tartines are amazing.

My all time favorite strawberry crunch salad!

My green goddess roasted carrot salad is pretty to look at and equally as delish.

This artichoke burrata pizza is crazy good.

Can’t ever beat ricotta gnocchi.

Or skillet toasted ravioli with lemon.

You have to try lavender banana bread!

Strawberry iced pound cake too.

And finally, strawberry pistachio turnovers!
